name: SnackGPT
description: AI-powered recipe generator that creates personalized recipes based on available ingredients, user mood, and weather conditions. Features Eliza AI agent for intelligent context analysis and enhanced recipe generation with multiple cooking style voices (Shakespeare, Gordon Ramsay, 5-year-old). Implements MCP protocol with JSON-RPC 2.0 over HTTP+SSE for real-time communication.

tools.name: suggest_dish
tools.description: Generates a creative dish based on user ingredients, mood, and weather using Eliza AI agent for context analysis and enhanced prompt engineering.

dish_name.description: Creative name for the generated dish

ingredients.description: List of ingredients for the recipe

eliza_enhanced.description: Whether the recipe was enhanced by Eliza agent

features: Eliza AI agent for context analysis

eliza_agent.name: Eliza
eliza_agent.description: Eliza is an AI agent that acts as an intelligent intermediary between the MCP server and Comput3 AI. It analyzes user context (mood, weather, style), enhances prompts, and post-processes responses for better recipe generation.

security.authentication: API key support via X-API-Key header

output.instructions:
Step 1. Thou shalt begin by seasoning the chicken with herbs and garlic, verily, to taste.
Step 2. In a pan, heat olive oil over medium heat, then add the chicken and cook until golden brown.
Step 3. Add rice and tomatoes to the pan, stirring gently that all ingredients doth mingle.
Step 4. Cover and simmer until rice is tender and chicken is cooked through.
Step 5. Serve hot and enjoy this merry feast!
output.style_description: O, fair cook, this dish doth bring joy to the heart and warmth to the soul! The golden chicken, the fluffy rice, and the sweet tomatoes create a symphony of flavors that shall delight thy senses on this sunny day!
